title.narrative: Saferworld Sudan Agents of Change fas 2
Saferworld Sudan Agents of Change phase 2

description.narrative:
Saferworld har ansökt till Sida om finansiering för projektet 'Agents of Change phase 2' i Sudan under perioden 2021-2024.
Målet med insatsen är att bidra till ett inkluderande, demokratiskt och fredligt Sudan, genom att stärka civilsamhällets - i synnerhet kvinnor och ungas - deltagande i politiska och socialt transformativa processer, i enlighet med samma förändringsaktörers vision om att få till stånd "frihet, fred och rättvisa". Insatsen är en forsättning på pilotfasen 'Agents of Change', som implementerades med Sida-finansiering under en 18-månadersperiod mellan 2019-21. Saferworld arbetar i huvudsak genom att identifiera och stärka lokala fredsbyggandeinitiativ i Sudans konflikthärjade södra stater, Blå Nilen, Södra Kordofan och Västra Kordofan. Saferworld har även för avsikt att implementera aktiviteter i Khartoum.
Den totala budgeten för projektet uppgår till 41 100 000 kronor fördelat över tre år. Sida har även avsatt 300 000 kronor för en studie med syftet att granska Saferworld Sudans interna styrning och kontrollsystem. Den total budgeten uppgår således till 41 400 000 kronor.

Saferworld has applied to Sida for funding for the project 'Agents of Change phase 2' in Sudan for the period 2021-2024.
The overall objective of the intervention is to contribute to an inclusive, democratic and peaceful Sudan, through enhancing the contribution of civil society, particularly women and youth, to processes of political and social transformation as expressed by the change actors’ vision of 'Freedom, Peace and Justice'. The project builds on the 18 months long 'Agents of Change' pilot, implemented with Sida funding between 2019-21. Saferworld primarily works in Sudan's war-torn southern states, including Blue Nile State, South Kordofan and West Kordofan. Saferworld also implements peacebuilding activities in Khartoum.
Total project budget amounts to 41 100 000 SEK over three years. In addition, Sida has allocated 300 000 SEK for a review of management and internal control. Thus, the total budget amounts to 41 400 000 SEK.

The overall objective of Saferworld's Agents of Change phase 2 project is to contribute to an inclusive, democratic and peaceful Sudan, through enhancing the contribution of civil society, particularly women and youth, to processes of political and social transformation as expressed by the change actors’ vision of 'Freedom, Peace and Justice'. Project outcomes 1-3 are formulated according to different levels of engagement and intended change. Outcome 4 is cross-cutting. Outcome 1: Youth and women groups from Blue Nile, South Kordofan, West Kordofan and Two Areas IDP populations contribute to peaceful and inclusive social and political transformation in their respective localities and states to mitigate against drivers of conflict and division. Outcome 2: Civil society and women and youth groups have a stronger voice, for enhancing inclusion of women and youth in state transition fora and processes. Outcome 3: Civil society including women and youth-led groups influence national level actors and processes on issues within the transitional period around peace, security and justice. Outcome 4: Saferworld and civil society generate knowledge about the dynamics of Sudan’s transition process and lessons for peacebuilding practice that can be shared and applied.

sector.narrative: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
